thread.title: Stocks Extend Declines After Fed Minutes

author: Kenan Machado
title: Stocks Extend Declines After Fed Minutes
text:
U.S. stocks rose Thursday, putting major indexes on track to snap their recent run of losses.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average gained 348 points, or 1.4%, to 25146 in recent trading, while the S&P 500 rose 1.1%. The Nasdaq Composite moved 0.8% higher.
Stocks have fluctuated wildly this week, highlighting the marketâ€™s fragility as investors...
